title: Unable to connect to game
body: So I tried playing a game of ranked after the patch, only for the game to immediately crash upon me clicking recconnect to game anyone else having these issues?

replies.body:
Hey

Were you able to connect to the game at all?

What ISP are you with and which city are you in?

Mindstar
After 13 minutes I was finally able to connect. I am with TPG and I live in West Sydney
Any chance you guys think that the issue before might ongoing? Because I am getting some people on my friends list tell me that there are a lot of people that are unable to connect after champ select

We've seen a small number of reports of this so far.   How many of your friends are having the issue?

The best thing they can do if they are having similar issues would be to post here.  That way we can get a gauge of who is impacted, what ISP they are on, and where they are.

Cheers
Mindstar
after closing it manually in task manger >process. I was able to reconnect after relogging.
its happening again. I had WoW open before hand. Think it might be related?
had like about 5 friends that told me about it
I am also having the same problem so i had someone else loggin and play and it worked for them.

Exact same problem with the game i just played, took me 20mins or so to get into the game from load screen D=

Optus, Brisbane.
Thanks - how many games have you played so far today?  Have you had this kind of issue on all of them or just the one?

Played two games today, has happened both games. 
Second game only took about 3mins but still annoying.
